website_summaries.verdict: Features a good deal of ergonomic support and is very adjustable, although some users don't like the look of the chair.
pros: Constructed of a breathable mesh back with a mesh-covered, high-density seat
You can adjust the arms, height, and back depth
Built-in support for lumbar region, head, and neck
cons: Slight assembly issues include the instructions (minimal) and  hardware (not labeled)

website_summaries.verdict: A highly comfortable chair from a reputable manufacturer.
pros: You can even adjust seat depth
cons: Minimum seat height is not great for some shorter people

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, you cannot trust these reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Download a chrome extension called Fakespot for amazon, and run it against the reviews for this chair. It received a D, with multiple pieces of evidence suggesting this chair's reviews are fake. I wish I knew about this before I bought the chair. The char is not comfortable, its too hard. I have to use a pillow because its so hard. the head extension does not extend forward enough, so I have to use a wrapped up towel for it to be usable. I was sold based on the reviews, I only wish I discovered the extension sooner. The only reason it received 2 stars instead of 1 is because it is quite sturdy. I do not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: 90 percent there but five stars any way
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not perfect but I'll give it five stars anyway. I like most things about it -- adjustability, size, construction -- the mesh is a bit too springy (i.e. weak like rubber bands). I also would like the foam padding in the armrests to be a bit stiffer. The front ends of the rests are flexible and I worry they will eventually give out over time. Only speculation for now. On the other hand, before buying this chair, I bought the comparably priced GM Seating ErogHuman and although that chair is built like a Panzer it is as comfortable as a torture machine. For context, I'm 6'1", 185 pounds and the Ergohuman chair fits me great.
customer_reviews.author: Hard T. PleaseTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Best chair I have ever sat in and amazing for ...
customer_reviews.text: 650 dollars for a chair!? Ya, i thought it was crazy too. Then, I bought a bed that was 2k and it changed my life. I decided to learn from that and spent money on this chair. I work from home 3 days a week which means countless hours in this chair and man has it been worth every penny. I used to get bouts of sciatica and have to go get massages, haven't had one since. I've made back the money there alone. Seriously, if you can afford it spend your money on things that will improve your life, this is definitely one. Best chair I have ever sat in and amazing for long hours.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I have terrible chronic back issues and this chair allows me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible chronic back issues and this chair allows me to sit through meetings that are hours long, when before I had to stand and take breaks. highly recommend. Only gripe is that the lumbar support is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s high quality but no support to my back.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s well made. But I don’t feel any support to my back! I bought this $620 chair since I have back pain, I though it would felt better. But my old $100 Walmart chair even better than this one for lumbar support. I have to use a cushion to support my back so what’s the point to buy this one? Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Yang

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I used this chair as my primary office chair for about 5 years, and while the chair is comfortable enough, it's not very durable. The plastic levers on the bottom of the chair snapped off first, and dangled loosely below the seat. One of the armrests broke after a couple of years and would no longer stay up. Then finally the hydraulics in the chair went out and the chair would slowly sink down over the course of the day. I got a few good years of use out of it, but for the price I would have expected it to last far longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: I paid 600$ for a chair and I really wish it leaned back... Good chair at first. I am 6`1 140. Head rest pushes my head a little bit forward and its hard to relax leaning back with my back straight. Also the hinges on the back rest for me sink in and dont stick out enough to help me maintain my support. My height must contribute to this uncomfortable posture for long term sitting. "Hard to find the sweet spot". Good product and construction. I love the mesh and design.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel franco

customer_reviews.title: not ergonomic terrible design, extremely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: highly non ergonomic. when sitting down while seat is slid out, you basically sit on the edge of the back of the seat the seat is too high off the ground at lowest setting meaning your feet are suspended in the air and i have long legs extremely overpriced for the non ergonomic nature of it the hand rests are extremely far apart and do not slide in like some 3d armrests the seat is very hard i’m confident chairs at a fraction of the cost of this one are more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: wraak

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Ergo Human chair - I bought my first one in 2005 and loved it. Very comfortable and long lasting. Eventually, one of the arms broke off of that chair (~2012) and when I contacted the company to see if I could buy another arm, they sent me one for free. Great customer service! The new chair has some updated features and is very comfortable. Word of advice: ensure that you keep all of the bolts tightened - they will loosen up over time and this is what leads to parts breaking over time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Justice

customer_reviews.title: Best office chair I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've sat in a lot of office chairs over my 30+ year career and this one is the best by far. It supports the whole back and neck nicely, and doesn't leave you hurting when you go to stand. It takes a little personal adjusting, including the headrest, to get this right but with the right adjustments this chair makes me happy. Very solid construction, nice finishes, and looks like something fit for an executive office.
customer_reviews.author: Colin D.

customer_reviews.title: overpriced for what it is
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of use, I do not think the chair was worth the cost. It is not extremely comfy like i hoped it would be for the cost. My butt goes numb after a couple hours which does not go well when i am in a chair many hours a day. It is built well, but the curved back part is already getting weak. I am also not impressed with the arm rest. It should have a lock when its in position because they move or rise easily.
customer_reviews.author: tt

customer_reviews.title: Bad seller, but the manufacturer is great with customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with the headrest broken. Bad for Wrigley's Business Products and Services who sold it. -1 star for them Called Eurotech about it and they shipped a whole new back out at no cost. Good for them!! 5+ stars for Eurotech. Overall, I am happy with the chair, except I was expecting more functionality. Only 3 set positions for the back and the seat angle cannot be adjusted independently. So, I'm still looking for a better chair and will sell this one at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Was hesitant to spend the money on this and was originally looking at a DX Racer or the like gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: I no longer notice any back issues after getting this chair. Was hesitant to spend the money on this and was originally looking at a DX Racer or the like gaming chair. Very happy that I went with this instead. I've dealt with the leather coated chairs peeling before and the mesh on this is great. Only downside is if you tend to sit cross-legged in chairs like I do you will want to have socks on or it rubs a bit on your ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Office Chair
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that struck me is how heavy the box was. Then when you put the chair together you could tell the very very high quality. The base is solid steel alone and very heavy. Easy to assemble with great clear instructions. It took only 5-10 min. Now using it, i wonder why i did not step up to this a long time ago! It is not a cheap chair, but this is a great example of how much more you can get for a step up price. I use my chair daily for many hours at a time and i am loving this! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cabot J. Longnecker

customer_reviews.title: the chair is near perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: So far (about a week), the chair is near perfect for me. I bought it used (on Amazon). While this chair is expensive at ~$600, it is NOT $3K. As such, it has a lot of adjustments, but it NOT infinitely adjustable. Every office worker should try a high-back desk chair (with head rest). The one improvement I would like to see is the ability to fold the arm rests back, getting them totally out of the way. This could be done with a pivot on the bottom of the arm rest, where it attaches to the chair. Cheaper versions (from Costco) have this option.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 180 pounds and am 5' 8", and this chair is an awesome fit for me. I typically sit for around 8-12 hours a day, so a comfortable chair is a must. The reclining tension adjustment is supportive enough for me at about 80% tension setting. It is my first mesh chair, and it is more comfortable and breezy than any cushion I have tried. I also find the back supportive and comfortable. A con would be that the arm rest angle can accidentally be moved without much effort, but overall, it is so much more ergonomic, breezy, and comfortable than my previous $150 Office Depot chair.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos P.

customer_reviews.title: They are still in the box, but I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: They are still in the box, but I've had these before. All the brokers try to get these...the Herman Miller version of these are $1,100. These are the same thing...half the price...still expensive but wait til you sit in this...you don't sit, exactly, you kind of hover.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The Arms Rests ARE NOT Fully Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this chair, but after assembling it, I discovered that the armrests are not fully adjustable, as indicated in the description. They are really wide and would only fit people with much larger/wider hips/torso. I have a normal size frame, and the arms rests aren't adjustable in toward the body and away from the body. They only go up or down and swivel side to side. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost three years later and I am still as satisfied with this product as the day it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on July 20, 2015. Almost three years later and I am still as satisfied with this product as the day it arrived. I worked from home until January 2017. After work, I would play PC games until late at night. Basically, I was in this chair for most of my waking hours for a year and a half. Never did I ever feel any discomfort or pain from this chair. After nearly three years, the chair looks as good as Day 1. There are no signs of wear on any part of the chair, including the mesh seating. I would 100% buy this chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: But...
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable, but, after a four months, a really annoying squeaky noise appeared. Each time you move just a little bit you can hear it. Update: The seller just sent us the parts to replace the noisy ones!!! Took only 3 days to arrived. Very happy we them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: we bought one of these a few weeks ago, really solid construction and main benefit: no more shoulder pain.. love the build quality, so we just got another one. Complaint?: packaging in both : outside box was torn, inside packaging is quite good do so no visible damage.
customer_reviews.author: Dipanshu Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Good for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my lower back pain disappeared after using this for work. I'm short 5'2" so my legs dangle or I sit too far forward in most chairs. There are so many settings with this chair that it just works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Best ergo chair I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one for almost 10 years. After having multiple back surgeries, sitting will never be comfortable. This is the only chair that allows me to work at my desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Used to Rule

customer_reviews.title: this chair is so wonderfully comfortable and has exactly the right adjustments in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews; however, this chair is so wonderfully comfortable and has exactly the right adjustments in the right places, that I felt compelled to contribute.. It is easy to put together with clear directions and everything included. The lower back support is excellent and I find the neck rest to be well shaped and in the right place. The airiness of the seat and back breathe well and the leaning back/forward motion is just what I wanted. I love this chair and have had it only one day!
customer_reviews.author: Sudsbrew

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment- my search is over!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair- exactly what I expected and what I needed. Worth the money and glad I made the investment. Perfect lumbar support and height adjustments. Adjustable to your preference. I'm 5.5 and it works for me. No need for professional assembly. EASY to assemble - less than 30 minutes. It took more time to unwrap packaging than it took to assemble. Great instructions. Everything you need is in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Keaton

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a lower cost alternative to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lower cost alternative to the HM Aeron and in this chair I found it. The only thing I will say I miss over the other chair is the rocking seat as opposed to just tilting the back. However even that is very slight, due to the adjustable back and headrest. I am a tall person at 6'4" and I really appreciate the adjustments, since I am 4-6 inches taller than the design 90 percent of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Miller

customer_reviews.title: I just love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. I have suffered back problems for 10 years, and I cannot sit long term until this chair. At first, it hurt my spine and I read the reviews that it takes a few days. It's all perfectly true. On the third day, my back stopped aching after sitting for an hour. I hesitated in purchasing the chair due to price and assembly, but I am so happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Waddell-Motter

customer_reviews.title: Chair for giants
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great chair for my back, but its made for people with really long legs. On the lowest setting my feet are off the ground. Also barely a month after getting it the seat broke and keeps sliding back a forward.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for long shifts
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chairs. I Work 12hr shifts in control room. These chairs breath to keep you cool and comfortable. We have one that is 9yrs old still being used. Purchased 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Base damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The base was damaged during shipping, but there is no way to replace for a new base. Put quite some effort assembling the chair, don’t want to waste time to return the whole chair to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: lyoka

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. It was easy to assemble and easy to operate. There are a lot of features to adjust the chair to the way you like it.
customer_reviews.author: just another brick in the wall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could be better if the headrest and lumbar support could be moved forward or backward. Update: The arms have developed a problem. If you change the height adjustment they do not lock properly. I may have to contact the seller for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vik. Singh

customer_reviews.title: less than 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: the back is loosing firmness and I can fill the metal bars digging into my back. The netting is stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Hart III

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but not for 5'8
customer_reviews.text: I inch higher with the lowest seating height. Great support and ergonomic. Since every part is heavy, you better to have one more person help for assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Kazuhiro Funakoshi

customer_reviews.title: Clear Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, very well made, easy to assemble, incredibly comfortable with all the various adjustments. I used to have the Herman Miller Aeron chair in corporate life, and I loved them. This chair is better at nearly half the price. I am 6'2 and 250 lbs, and the Ergohuman chair offers great support and proper ergonomics for me. All things line up to make this chair a clear winner!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D.

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, good value
customer_reviews.text: I would not advise this chair for a tall person. I am 6'2, 225 and have problems with my legs falling asleep due to the mesh bottom, the back lumbar pushes my legs too far forward even after adjusting, and the back isn't long enough. I regret making this purchase. UPDATE 8/7/2017 Ergohuman was able to send a replacement seat. The process of swapping the from the old to the new was difficult, but worth the investment of time and effort. The chair is a great example of an ergonomically sound office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Martin B. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: After years of cheap office chairs and hip and leg pain over the last year, I sprung for this chair. The amount of adjustments is fantastic - you can get a totally custom feel. I really love how the seat itself will slide forward or backward, making room for bigger butts if needed. The arms rests go up and down and in and out which was crucial for me, since I switched over to a mid-keyboard mouse. Great chair!
customer_reviews.author: StudioPeg

customer_reviews.title: Best chair I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an ergonomic chair that doesn't put much strain on your circulation and is super comfortable. I bought this chair and I never regretted it. I have had it for over a year already with no issues. 10/10 would play Cyberpunk 2077.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Receive the product in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: Love its packaging. Serve its purpose. I had sciatica which triggered my buying of this chair. I feel it helps a lot by releasing stress in my lower back. Worth it. No pain since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good desk chair
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this chair and really likes it. I'm a a little shorter and it doesn't fit me as well. The arms are adjustable and because of this (I assume) the arms are a bit wiggly. I don't like wiggly chairs. But we've had it a while and it functions very well. WE exchanged the wheels for larger softer wheels so as not to harm our hardwood floor. This has proved to have bee a good idea. I would buy again, but do recommend the larger wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised, well packed all pieces included. Easy assembly with explicit directions and diagrams and only 6 screws, I have no idea why someone would pay for someone to come and assemble it. The most comfortable chair I have ever sat in!
customer_reviews.author: Jeb S. Teichman

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair based on the great reviews. I had back fusion surgery 7 months ago and the reviews about it were so great for that. Well, it is much worse than the old chair I got from Staples. My back is killing me with all the work from home sitting. Regret the purchase. Want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kordyban

customer_reviews.title: Great adaptable office chair
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable chairs I have sat in. Very adaptable. FYI, I am 6'6" and have severe back problems. For the money, you can't go wrong. I spent almost twice as much on another office chair, and this chair is as comfortable, perhaps more so.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad spines
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and a bad neck. This chair is working great for me. I appreciate all the adjustments so even my little 5'1" frame can be comfortable and well supported.
customer_reviews.author: emwoodli

customer_reviews.title: Superb chair
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble with great adjustability. Comfortable for extended periods of time. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Gosberg

customer_reviews.title: Good chair with sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Burgundy one, but received the green one by mistake. I think that I prefer the green one so its not an issue for me. The chair was easy to assemble, with only 6 screws needed I would advise against using a impact driver/drill. You will more than likely cross thread the bolt and damage the chair. I bought the chair to replace a much cheaper one in my office, I am not disappointed so far. One of the box straps was split, but everything in the box was not affected.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for Tall People.
customer_reviews.text: I am about 6' 1" and the neck support hits my shoulders. The lumbar support doesn't go high enough to cover the lumbar area. Had they allowed the back of the chair to raise another 5 - 7 inches, it would have been more ergonomic. I also don't really like the armrests. They are very awkward and they do not move inwards - forcing you to lay your arms in strange and - long-term - uncomfortable angles. This chair may work well for you if you are under 5' 8". Otherwise, look elsewhere. Trust me, please. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Red Panda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is almost too good. It is strong, breathable, easy to set up and put together. I am a big guy and office chairs are hard for me to find. Made the mistake earlier this year and bought a specialty chair from local office store that was even more expensive. It was a dud. This chair ROCKS! It is the only chair that I will buy in the future. The seller shipped quickly and expertly. It was a pleasure to do business with them.
customer_reviews.author: r2a2

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair; gives good support; with the webbing on the seat portion, no more hot seat due to good ventilation. To me this was a good investment since I spend a lot of time in front of my computer working with photographs and compositing on Lightroom and Photoshop.
customer_reviews.author: Myron E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, and the setting stick like glue for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for almost 6 months now, Still loving it. So comfortable, and the setting stick like glue for me a 220lb 6'2 individual. My wife keeps stealing it and using it around the house so the only "complaint" I have is that once you get one everyone else in the house will want one too.
customer_reviews.author: John R Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair - Butt Gets Tired Sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Supports my lowe back really well and is incredibly customizable. I would say the one thing I miss from my leather recliner was that my butt seams to get tired after awhile. Perhaps that is a good thing though since it makes me get up and walk around!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 6'3".
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a 6'3" person. Sitting up straight forces my shoulders into the bottom of the headrest fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: schweizer

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend that ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend that likes to spend a decent amount of time in his office on his computer. It has helped his posture and his back doesn't hurt when he sits for too long.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Most confortable chair I have ever sat in. Unpacking it instantly shows its quality. Lots of quality metal casting work in the base and back. The neck rest is adjustable up and down as are the arm rests. The lower back rest is helpful in support on long days at the desk. Highly recommend this chair
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Ottesen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Best chair I've ever owned. Super comfortable and love the headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Maranon

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived on time, it was not to hard to assemble and it has been very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides very good support for the back
customer_reviews.text: Provides very good support for the lower back. It also looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Sollosy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I can't express to you how much comfort this chair has already supplied my back. I've been suffering with sever back pain and occasional back spasms that have required me to take physical therapy to treat. This took maybe 30 minutes to build and about 10m to adjust. I've been please ever since. Told the girlfriend how much I dropped on a chair and she flipped. But, after sitting in it, she could see why. High quality and great comfort. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Chair!
customer_reviews.text: We've had these chairs at the office for six years, and the Ergohuman has been a Godsend for my back. I finally decided to order one for my home office. This is the best desk chair I've ever had. The mesh seat is perfect -- when you sit down, you never reach anything hard. Yet it's very firm and supportive all around. My SIJ thanks you very, very much.
customer_reviews.author: Randall R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I’m able to sit in the chair for four hours with no back issues.
customer_reviews.author: SteveS

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. The best I have sat on so far. It is not perfect (none is), but for this price, you get that feeling of sitting on one of those expensive chairs. I suffer from neck pains. This chair's head support comfortably aligns right at the neck just below the head (it is adjustable up/down, but I hoped it could be adjustable horizontally towards the head). Overall an excellent chair for the money they are asking for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Antony

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought such expensive chair, but it's time to get thinking on what is worth for your health and comfort. After two weeks of search, review readings, comparisions and so I have decided for the Ergohuman. After its arrival, I assemble it, it's very easy, and...... what a chair. It really worth the investment, any other chair is now so uncomfortable, you can work all day without standing at all, so nice. There is a huge problem though, I have to buy two more chairs in the office because everyone want to be seated in the chair! All I can say is, THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal

customer_reviews.title: This chair has proven to be awesome in the first 72 hours
customer_reviews.text: This chair has proven to be awesome in the first 72 hours. It fits , adjusts and has all the features I need for long days in my home office.I have a back injury and this is great for my back. I highly recommend purchasing this model.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair
customer_reviews.text: I was at first worried about this chair given it's price, and that i had never sat in one in person before but i decided to give it a shot anyway. I bought this chair for my PC at home as I do a lot of gaming and found myself being uncomfortable after long gaming sessions with my previous chair. Once i got this chair and gave it a test run for about a week i was pleasantly surprised at how great it felt. The adjusting took a little while to get just right but after that it felt great. I highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Razgrim

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I find it has sufficient adaptability for ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was delayed, possibly by the industrial action the dockworkers were taking. Chair arrived in slightly battered packaging but was undamaged. I like it, I find it has sufficient adaptability for me and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST Office Chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the BEST! Well worth the money if you want great lower back support. I had been experiencing lower back pain with my last office chair and decided I needed to invest in a quality product, and the Ergohuman has fit the bill so far. Easy to assemble out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dininger

customer_reviews.title: I buy a lot of stuff from Amazon, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of stuff from Amazon, but don't normally rate items. The main thing that has impressed me with this chair is the engineering. It only takes 6 machined bolts to put the entire thing together. I am 6'4" and with all the options for adjustments, it is very versatile. Cant wait to try it out
customer_reviews.author: Stacy E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to assemble. I am short and my feet wont touch the floor on all chairs, my desk is tall; I can actually put my feet on the stand and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I do love this chair though
customer_reviews.text: I need to get into the chair business because these chairs cost a ton. I do love this chair though. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Duffie

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice chair, gives good support and has a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice chair, gives good support and has a lot of adjustability BUT the seal of the chair almost feels too hard after sitting in it for more than 30 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sully2013

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chair!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chair!!!! no issues. Very comfortable, but you must sit all the way back into the chair, not on the edge, like am doing now while I am typing away LOL ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: If you work behind a desk this is the chair you want
customer_reviews.text: The mesh in this chair prevents leg and back sweat. Very comfortable and you can adjust in almost every conceivable way. Head rest is also great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: This is the best office chair in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the best office chair in the world. I have had 2 back surgeries and I love it. I can't stress how important it is to have a mesh seat. It keeps my bottom cool. After 2 years, the chair still looks and feels brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Turner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality as expected but wishing I would have purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality as expected but wishing I would have purchased the leather version; the mesh hurts so I have to keep a blanket between me and the chair on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: W.Minx

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, comfortable, adjustable, and one annoying flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is incredibly comfortable. It has every adjustment you can imagine. It looks great. It has honestly helped a ton with back pain I have had from bad posture and insufficient lumbar and neck support. My only complaint is that the arm rests do not lock in place and they swivel constantly... It is very annoying. Every time you get up, sit down, or move the chair, they turn out of place and adjustment. There should be a way to lock them in place. It is obvious once spending even a few minutes in the chair. I am amazed it made it past R&D with such a glaring flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Evans

customer_reviews.title: but comfortable enough for VERY long (8+ hours) gaming sessions
customer_reviews.text: Not a lounging chair, but comfortable enough for VERY long (8+ hours) gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: P. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. I prefer it to the Aeron.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely comfortable, multi-featured chair that fits me better than the Aeron -- and is lower priced. This is the fourth one I've bought for my home and office(s) and I've been just as pleased each time.
customer_reviews.author: 6-StringAcoustic

customer_reviews.title: Good adjustable chair.
customer_reviews.text: Good chair. Mesh provides good airflow. Many adjustable settings. Only wish lumbar could be raised a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Skewbee

customer_reviews.title: chair
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Worth the price. Well made. Above expectations. I waited 3 yrs to buy this and wish I had done it right away. Makes work so enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyne Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: My company bought this chair for me, after I started having back and hamstring issues. I am able to adjust it perfectly for me although the seat pan just barely extends far enough. (I am just shy of 6' 2", with a thin, athletic build.) The lumbar support is adjustable, but not continuously. Instead, adjusts at discrete intervals of what might be .5 inches. (I can't see two adjacent holes, with my setting, and I ain't touching it.) I can only use the neck brace by consciously leaning back into it. The chair seems very well built. I had no trouble putting it together, and I doubt it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Allison

customer_reviews.title: The chair is great. Helps maintain correct posture
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great. Helps maintain correct posture, when working all day in front of a computer. Sturdy and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamml

customer_reviews.title: Best chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the money. They are very comfortable and I don't get hot sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Goodman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIR - Finally
customer_reviews.text: Great chair and very comfortable and adjustable to all figures. This is the chair I have been looking for but afraid to pay for. Very good choice and helps my back
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great support and
customer_reviews.text: My husband works from home and he loves this chair. Great support and comfort
customer_reviews.author: chococross

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair for long-term sitting. The lumbar support works well and the chair is very customizable. Construction quality is as good as, or even better than, the Herman Miller Aeron chair, but this one is $200 less. I think it looks better than the Aeron too.
customer_reviews.author: FreeThinker

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was involved in a car accident in January sustained a neck injury (damaged ligaments in my neck) which was excruciatingly painful. Someone recommended this chair to me and I ordered it. It was one of the best decisions I've ever made in my life. It is so comfortable and it supports my neck and entire spine like a charm. I absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad bit off but the best chair that I have found..
customer_reviews.text: I compared this to the freedom chairs and the areons, I prefer this one.. very comfy will probably get more so once the mesh loosens up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Super chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. I am able to sit in it for hours on end and not get hot or fatigued. Anyone who sits all day will appreciate this chair. Don’t let the price tag fool you, to me it’s well worth every penny not being tired at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: clinton howeth

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory for someone that sits down...
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. This is my second one and wouldn't trade it for any other chair. I am an IT professional and find myself doing marathons sitting down for work. This chair makes me not want to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Fine executive chair
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I would change with this chair is that there be a lumbar adjustment for support. In every other way this is the best chair I have ever used within the office.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Grant

customer_reviews.title: good product, although the lumbar support isn't very obvious
customer_reviews.text: overall good product, but the lumbar support feels too far back. i am considering add more cushion for the lower back.
customer_reviews.author: H. Gu

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good and the quality seems very good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels good and the quality seems very good. I'm glad I bought this chair instead of the Hermon Miller Aeron.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Roche

customer_reviews.title: Best Chair Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best chair I have purchased in years!! Completely relives my lower back and now I don't have to get up every 30 mins to stretch out my aching back!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Greer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chair
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and well-packaged. Exactly matches the older chair we have in the office. Easy to assemble. Very adjustable. I personally find the mesh so comfortable! My husband has one and I likes it so much more than mine, I ended up buying this one. This is the older version of the Ergohuman. It is also much cheaper than buying it locally.
customer_reviews.author: fixit

customer_reviews.title: The chair was easy to assemble and very solid construction
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to assemble and very solid construction. Unfortunately the seat was too narrow for me. I was sitting on the frame bars of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: j burke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfy as I had hoped but it has fixed my back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Chair Ever
customer_reviews.text: The greatest chair I have ever sat in. Honestly feels like I'm sitting on a cloud. Don't let the price push you away. You will never need another office chair again. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best damm chair for the money. I always have purchased the 100 dollar chairs from office supply store having to replace them every three years. This chair has a life time quarantee and wow, what a confortable chair. The lumbar support is amazing, the arm rest are adjustable up and down and turn and finally the head rest is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Gates

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. I'm a big person and this chair sits ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I'm a big person and this chair sits very comfortable. The only drawback is that I have a very thick carpet and the chair will not budge. I literally must stand to reposition the chair.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Brantley

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I could say about it from my point ...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I could say about it from my point of view is that it is very comfortable and that it really helps my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

product_meta.title: Ergohuman High Back Swivel Chair with Headrest, Black Mesh & Chrome Base
product_meta.description: Color:BlackEUROTECH Ergohuman Mesh Chairs feature eight ergonomic adjustments for maximum comfort all day. Breathable mesh seat and back promote air circulation and offer increased support. Adjustability includes: tilt tension control, tilt lock, back angle, back height, synchro tilt, seat height, seat depth, and arm height. Chrome/polypropylene base with nylon casters. Made of 97% recyclable components. Greenguard indoor air quality certified. Meets or exceeds ANSI/BIFMA standards.
feature_bullets: Back angle adjustment with 3 position tilt-lock adjusts easily - lock the chair back into place in one of three positions, or simply use the tension control adjustment to control the amount of force to recline or sit up straight
Pneumatic cylinder raises and lowers chair quickly
Back, seat cushion, and headrest all adjust to fit an array of users and accommodate their individual needs
Contoured, height adjustable lumbar support provides long-term comfort
Synchro-tilt mechanism and seat depth adjustment ensure users sit correctly and get the support they need, whether sitting upright or reclining
Height adjustable, pivoting armrests work with a variety of seated postures and tasks
Overall dimensions: 26.5" x 29" x 46-52" (W x D x H); Seat height: 18.5" (at lowest point) 22.2" (at highest point); Seat dimensions: 20.5" x 18.5" (W x D); Back dimensions: 20.5" x 28" (W x H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars318 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
